ModMetaData.name: PositivelyCompatability
ModMetaData.author: PositivelyAcademical
ModMetaData.description:
u/PositivelyAcademical's RimWorld cross-compatability mod. A work in progress.
The main purpose of this project is for me to experiment with git version control. Not all commits to main will be functional / free from errors. Updating to the latest commit not guaranteed to be savegame compatible.
